    {"s":"Ultrasound Imaging", "p":"uses", "o":"US Transducer", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Then, we’ll shift to the engineering aspects — how we actually generate and detect these waves using an ultrasound transducer."},

evidence: We’ll look at different types of resolution specific to ultrasound - axial resolution, lateral resolution, and spatial resolution.
